title: Purrs & Poison: Chatty Cat Cozy Mysteries No. 1
description: This talking cat's about to find himself in fur deep when one of the first humans to hear him becomes a murder suspect, and the cat’s his only alibi. You've got to be kitten me.Brighton finally has a cushy home with the purrfect sunny spot and a human family who can hear him. But all that's threatened when one of them is found standing over their poisoned landlord, the town’s beloved ice cream maker and one of Brighton’s favorite humans. With Brighton being his human’s only alibi, he must use his superior feline stealth and intellect to clear their name—and avenge his friend’s death.His only clue is a cryptic note declaring revenge. Brighton can’t believe anyone would want revenge against a woman as sweet as the frozen treats she was well-loved for…until he discovers that she was scooping startling secrets alongside her ice cream.Soon the killer realizes the cat and his humans are investigating, and it’s clear they’ll stop at nothing to keep Brighton from poking his paws into their business. Can Brighton sniff out the killer before they snuff out him and his family?If you like snarky cats, humorous adventures, and charming characters, then you'll love Elle Wren Burke’s whisker-raising mystery.Buy Purrs & Poison to find out if curiosity can kill this cat
author: Elle Wren Burke
